thread.title: Crochet Different Types of Hats with These Free...
thread.title_full: Crochet Different Types of Hats with These Free...

title: Crochet Different Types of Hats with These Free...

organizations.name: daisy mae cloche hat with flower (toddlers & adult sizes

text:
• Team Spirit Hat  Free Pattern 
Show your support for your favorite sports team; crochet a unisex hat design in your team's colors. See an image gallery featuring close-up photos of the hat, and learn about back loop single crochet stitch, the stitch used to crochet this pattern. More » Slouch Hat. Slouch Hat -- Photo © Erica Jackofsky 
This easy slouch hat is a stylish design you'll enjoy both crocheting and wearing. It's a versatile fashion accessory that works well with many different casual looks. More » Snowflake Cloche Hat. Snowflake Cloche Hat -- Photo © Erica Jackofsky • Snowflake Cloche Hat 
This fun hat is a cloche design that's just a little bit slouchy. You can decorate it with an eye-catching snowflake as pictured, but you can make the snowflake removable so the hat can also be worn in spring or fall. Multiple sizes are available; the pattern is sized for teens and adults. More » Crochet Cloche Hat. Crochet Cloche Hat - Photo © Erica Jackofsky • Daisy Mae Cloche Hat With Flower (Toddlers & Adult Sizes) 
The "Daisy Mae cloche" is a feminine hat with a hint of ruffle and a sweet little 3d flower . 
You can crochet this beautiful hat for all the gals in the family! With such a wide range of sizes, the possibilities are fun to contemplate. This would be a great pattern to use for making matching mother/daughter hats or cute matching hats for sisters or best friends to wear. More » Granny Square Beanie Hat. Granny Square Beanie Hat -- Photo © Erica Jackofsky 
This quick and fun project combines two of the most popular crocheted items you could think of -- hats and granny squares . The squares are arranged to form a groovy patchwork beanie style hat. More » Visor Beanie Hat Pattern. Visor Beanie Hat Pattern - Photo © Erica Jackofsky • Visor Beanie Hat Patterns 
The concept: start with a basic beanie, but add a visor. The result: a hat that's perfect for the sun-loving outdoorsy crowd. The visor beanie pictured at left is suitable for sunny days that are also on the chilly side. The visor offers a bit of protection from the sun, and it's a stylish wardrobe addition for the days when you're feelin' casual and dressing the part. The unisex design makes it a great look for both guys and gals. It's also an easy pattern to crochet. 
Want to see more options? Check out this list of visor beanie hat patterns. Prev
